title: PCl5 equil. - which statement about Kp is correct

content.prompt: Which of the following statements about Kp, the equilibrium constant for the reaction, is correct?

choices.label: It cannot be determined whether Kp > 1, Kp < 1, or Kp = 1 without additional information.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
